p: The last model used in the present study was the castor oil-induced enteropooling model that aimed to assess the secretary components of diarrhea. The anti-enteropooling properties of some medicinal plants have been attributed to their phytochemical constituents. 38 Flavonoids have been displayed secretion inhibition response by reducing synthesis inflammatory mediator prostaglandin E2. 36 Tannates protein produced during tannin interaction with small intestinal mucosa may reduce the secretion. 29
